decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following plans: 2203-3-001 Rev A, 2203-3-010 Rev A, 2203-3-015 Rev A, 2203-3-016 Rev A, 2203-3-025 Rev A, 2203-3-026 Rev A, 2203-3-106 Rev A, 2203-3-202 Rev A, 2203-3-206 Rev A, 2203-3-301 Rev A, 2203-3-302 Rev A, 2203-3-303 Rev A, 2203-3-304 Rev A, 2203-3-521 Rev A, 2203-3-522 Rev A, 1965-XX-SK-001 Rev 01, Design Access & Heritage Impact Statement Rev C 15/01/25, Appendix 1 Site Photos, Phasing Statement, Plant Noise Assessment J626_R02.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 4 - The proposed development works should be delivered in a phased format: 

(a) Roof works 
(b) Facade works 
(c) ASHP Enclosure works 

The ASHP enclosure works (c) cannot be implemented before both the Roof works (a) and the Facade works (b) have been completed unless they are being completed concurrently with the ASHP Enclosure works (c). 

Reason: This is so the visual uniformity and integrity of the listed terrace is maintained and protected in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
description: Replacement of existing terrace roof incorporating new solar panels, the reinstatement of existing rooflights and addition of new rooflights, external alterations,  installation of air source heat pumps with associated louvred rooftop enclosures
